def_cn: 麻木迟钝的人;毫无生气的人;无精打采的人
def_en: You can describe someone as a zombie if their face or behaviour shows no feeling, understanding, or interest in what is going on around them.

def_cn: （恐怖故事或某些宗教中的）僵尸，还魂尸
def_en: In horror stories and some religions, a zombie is a dead person who has been brought back to life.
